Projects

Shop Management System

Description:

The Shop Management System is a Java-based application designed to simplify retail operations. It manages inventory, tracks sales, generates customer bills, and calculates daily profits.

Features:

  • Add, update, and monitor stock levels with low-stock alerts.
  • Customer cart management and bill generation with real-time stock updates.
  • Tracks daily sales and calculates profits by comparing selling and cost prices.

Technologies:

  • Language: Java
  • Data Structures: ArrayLists for dynamic data management
  • Libraries: java.time for date/time and Scanner for user inputs

Future Enhancements:

  • GUI development using JavaFX
  • Database integration for storing and retrieving product details

You can explore the full project on GitHub: Shop Management System Repository
